file_insights.changes_summary: Added comprehensive animation and transition support to Stepper component
key_modifications: Imported animation utilities (keyframes, duration, easing, createTransition, scaleIn) from utils/animations
Enhanced CustomConnector with transition for border-color using standardized createTransition function
Refactored StepIconContainer transition from hardcoded 'all 200ms ease-out' to createTransition utility with multiple properties
Created AnimatedCheckIcon styled component with scaleIn animation for completed step indicator
Created StepNumber styled component with conditional scaleIn animation for active step numbers
Added transitions to step labels for font-weight and color changes on active state

patterns_discovered.description: Replaced hardcoded transition values with centralized utility functions (createTransition, duration, easing constants)
patterns_discovered.significance: Enables consistent animation behavior across component and easier maintenance

patterns_discovered.description: StepNumber component uses conditional animation based on 'entering' prop state
patterns_discovered.significance: Allows fine-grained control over when animations trigger based on component state

patterns_discovered.description: Using createTransition with array of properties instead of 'all' keyword
patterns_discovered.significance: More performant and explicit about which properties animate, reducing unintended animations

patterns_discovered.description: Combines @emotion/react keyframes with styled MUI components for animations
patterns_discovered.significance: Leverages Emotion's scoping and Material-UI's theming for cohesive animation system

gotchas_discovered.description: Implementation assumes animation utilities exist at '../../utils/animations' with specific exports (duration, easing, createTransition, scaleIn)
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Must ensure all imported utilities are properly defined and exported from the animations utility file

gotchas_discovered.description: Previous implementation had hardcoded '200ms ease-out' for transitions; new implementation relies on duration.normal constant
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Verify duration.normal equals 200ms to maintain behavioral consistency

gotchas_discovered.description: AnimatedCheckIcon wraps CheckCircleIcon with fixed fontSize of 18, overriding potential parent styles
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Ensure icon sizing is consistent across different viewport sizes and contexts

gotchas_discovered.description: StepNumber animation only triggers when 'entering' prop is true; relies on parent component passing correct state
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Parent component must properly track and pass the 'entering' state to trigger animations at appropriate moments

approach_outcome.implementation_strategy: Methodical refactoring of hardcoded animations to use centralized utility functions while adding new animations for visual feedback
key_decisions: Used existing animation utilities instead of creating new inline animations
Applied animations to multiple interactive elements (connector, step number, check icon, label)
Used conditional animation for step numbers based on active state
Replaced generic 'all' transition with specific property lists for better performance
approach_outcome.completion_quality: High - All animation points in the stepper UI receive appropriate transitions
approach_outcome.testing_considerations: Animation performance, timing consistency, state-based animation triggering, browser compatibility

recommendations.suggestion: Verify that animation utility functions (duration, easing, createTransition, scaleIn) are properly exported and available from utils/animations before deployment
Consider using will-change CSS property on frequently animated elements (StepIconContainer, AnimatedCheckIcon) to improve rendering performance
Extract animation configuration (duration, easing values) into a stepper-specific configuration object for easier future adjustments
Consider adding subtle animations to the connector line itself when transitioning between steps (e.g., color fill animation)
Add visual regression tests to verify animation timing and behavior across different step states (pending, active, completed, error)
Document the animation behavior expectations for each step state in component JSDoc or Storybook to guide future modifications
